card 2.question: 2. Choose the correct form of the verb: "She ________________ to school every day."

card 4.question: 4. Which word is the adverb in the sentence? "She quickly ran to catch the bus."

card 5.question: 5. Fill in the blank: "I ________________ my homework before dinner."

card 6.question: 6. What type of conjunction is "however" in the sentence: "I wanted to go; however, I stayed."

card 7.question: 7. Choose the correct possessive form: "The cat licked _______ paws."

card 8.question: 8. Identify the gerund in the sentence: "Swimming is her favorite activity."

card 9.question: 9. What is the meaning of the homograph "tear"?

card 10.question: 10. Choose the correct form of the verb: "I ________________ the movie last night."

card 12.question: 12. Which word is the preposition in the sentence: "He sat on the chair."

card 13.question: 13. Fill in the blank: "When are you ________________ to the party?"

card 14.question: 14. What is the comparative form of "good"?

card 15.question: 15. Choose the correct plural form: "The man has one sheep. He has two _______."

card 17.question: 17. What type of pronoun is "who" in the sentence: "She is the one who called you."

card 18.question: 18. Correct the sentence: "I could of helped you."

card 19.question: 19. Choose the correct form of the verb: "They ________________ to the mall to buy clothes."

card 20.question: 20. Identify the infinitive form of the verb "to be" in the sentence: "I want to be successful."

card 21.question: 21. What is the superlative form of "far"?

card 23.question: 23. Fill in the blank: "Could you please ________________ the door for me?"

card 24.question: 24. What is the correct plural form of "cactus"?

card 25.question: 25. Which word is the conjunction in the sentence: "I like both chocolate and vanilla ice cream."
